titleStmt.title: The Case of the Protestant dissenters represented and argued
titleStmt.author: Howe, John, 1630-1705.
Stretton, Richard, 1631 or 2-1712.

notesStmt.note: Attributed both to John Howe and Richard Stretton. Cf. Rogers, H. Life and character of John Howe, 1836, p. 356; Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
